name: Vitaclean HQ
slogan: Vitamin C Shower Head with monthly refillable inserts
description: Our shower head neutralises chlorine and gives your hair a glossy shine and calms and soothes skin.  We are also scented.

jobs.title: Digital Ads Specialist
jobs.description:
We need someone who can handle all digital ads and optimise them for our company www.vitacleanhq.com

This would be across instagram/ adroll and other platforms.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We need someone who can handle all digital ads and optimise them for our company www.vitacleanhq.com

This would be across instagram/ adroll and other platforms.

jobs.title: Amazon Optimization Specialist (Product listing/Ads/ Reviews/)
jobs.description: We are looking for someone to manage Amazon with Product copy, Running Campaigns and generating reviews.  We sell in the UK on FBA and are looking to list more products in UK/ USA/ France/ Germany/ Canada
jobs.descriptionHtml: We are looking for someone to manage Amazon with Product copy, Running Campaigns and generating reviews. We sell in the UK on FBA and are looking to list more products in UK/ USA/ France/ Germany/ Canada

jobs.title: Shopify CRO expert
jobs.description: We are looking for someone to do CRO for our Shopify stores www.vitacleanhq.com . We are looking to build subscription so preferably someone who has experience in subscription businesses
jobs.descriptionHtml: We are looking for someone to do CRO for our Shopify stores www.vitacleanhq.com . We are looking to build subscription so preferably someone who has experience in subscription businesses
